content: of the shell below shell cluster in the next v- stitch cluster single_crochet into the middle double_crochet of the shell below repeat from * 3 more times set up is complete your piece should look like this for the body of the piece you will repeat these two row row7 ch4 double_crochet in same single_crochet counts as first v_stitch ch5 v_stitch in the next single_crochet to first corner ch5 v- stitch cluster in the corner *ch5 v_stitch in single_crochet between next shell ch5 do this to the next corner shell cluster v_stitch cluster in middle single_crochet of corner shell cluster repeat from * until you have done a shell cluster in the 4th corner then ch5 and v_stitch into each of the single_crochet between shells until right before you get to the first v_stitch of the round ch2 and double_crochet into the 3rd chain of the first v_stitch on row 7 this will be right after the fourth corner cluster but on subsequent row there will be more before you get to your starting v_stitch row 8 *7dc in next v_stitch single_crochet ** into the middle double_crochet of the shell below repeat from * to ** til you get to the next corner v_stitch cluster shell cluster in v_stitch cluster single_crochet in middle double_crochet from row below*** repeat * through *** 3 more times - to end of round repeat these two row ending on a row 8 crochet tip the v_stitch clusters only go in the 4 corners of the piece in all other cases you will do a v- stitch into the single_crochet on the four sides on your row 7 repeats please send me a message if you are having trouble and i would be happy to help you
